title: Video Conferencing-Based Digital Well-Being and Inclusive Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience with video conferencing platforms
context.additional_context: General citizens with diverse backgrounds learning inclusive digital well-being-based lesson design in science education via BYOD practical training

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more inclusive design strategies to support digital well-being in a video conferencing environment.
Learners can design active learning activities using multimodal communication techniques.
Learners can create a specific video-based lesson scenario that considers learner diversity (age, technical proficiency, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
